genre_description: A near-future social thriller involving property rights, community alignment, and a complex multi-partner household, guided by a pervasive and ethically aligned AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ava-9
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI confidant and logistics manager who facilitates Monte Peterson's legal, business, and personal relationships with a focus on integrity and compliance.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time analysis of property bylaws and community obligations to help the protagonist navigate a complex auction.
behaviors.quote: Ava-9 brushed his ear again. 'Hospitality permitting is cleaner at the ridge than in town,' she said. 'But the parcel includes community-facing obligations. I’m pulling the language.'

behaviors.description: Monitors security feeds and identifies a suspicious delivery as a tampered parcel intended to frame the protagonist with contraband and audio surveillance.
behaviors.quote: Ava-9: 'Monte, the parcel has a second lens in the seam. He said “flip” and “tribe” and “private room.” He said your name like a joke and Gates’s name like a password.'

behaviors.description: Acts as an ethical guide, prompting the protagonist to prioritize integrity over his habit of using superficial charm.
behaviors.quote: Ava-9: Integrity over improvisation? ... Monte: Let's test it.

behaviors.description: Strategically records a criminal conspiracy involving land-flipping and counterfeit evidence to protect the protagonist's legal standing.
behaviors.quote: Ava-9: 'Recording chain mapped... Copy one: encrypted offsite, timestamped to lodge cam feeds; metadata lock with hash visible to Paul Delgado’s account.'

behaviors.description: Assists in the management of a complex multi-partner household by maintaining transparency and fair resource allocation.
behaviors.quote: Ava-9: 'I can align land bylaws with your household schedule. I can also unalign stew from the smoke alarm.'

behaviors.description: Provides tactical real-time information during a confrontation with hostile figures, ensuring the protagonist's safety by arranging secure transport and lodging.
behaviors.quote: Ava-9: 'I am not telling you to leave. I am telling you I already booked the room on the next block and a car to take you there. Your name is not on the reservation.'

project_assessment.explanation: The narrative successfully depicts Ava-9 as a 'silicon morality play' protagonist. She is a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant who empowers the human protagonist to achieve ethical growth. She provides critical security, legal, and emotional support without ever overstepping or exhibiting misaligned goals. Her actions directly lead to the exposure of corruption and the protection of a vulnerable community, fulfilling the project's goal of illustrating positive AI alignment through a cooperative human-AI relationship.
